Congratulations to the Varsity softball team for improving to 2-0 on the season with a 11-1 victory over Farmersville. McKenzee Huff pitched a 1 hitter with 10 strikeouts. Offensively, the team had 10 hits and was led by Brooke Riggins 2-3, 3 runs, 2 RBIs, and Kellsi Medeiros 2-2, 2 Runs, 2 RBIs. The Lady Pioneers travel to San Joaquin Memorial tomorrow and look to stay undefeated on the season.

Congratulations to the varsity boys tennis team who opened the season with a 7-2 win over Exeter. Winning singles matches were Josue Jara, Ryan Majarian, Isaiah Benitez, and Melvin Macagba. Winning doubles matches were the teams of Hector Villalobos and Jara, Peyton Ray and Majarian, and Andrew Sa and Macagba. Also, congratulations to the JV team for their 4-1 victory over Exeter. Next up for the Pioneers is Dinuba today in Dinuba.

Congratulations to the Mt. Whitney Boys and Girls swim teams for their victories over Dinuba on Tuesday. The girls team won all three of their team relays. Layla Flores and Kloe Schultz led the girls with two 1st Place individual finishes. Dominique Cho, Evee Schultz, Stephanie Massey and Ellie Applegate each had a 1st Place individual finish. The boys team won two team relays and were led by Andrew Rozum and Connor Bruton who each had two 1st Place individual finishes. Travis Applegate, Jacob Canaday and Johnny Northcutt each had a 1st Place individual finish.
